title: Deploy the suite with the embedded K8s (Helm)
content:
This section provides information required to install the suite by using the Helm approach and the Kubernetes distribution bundled with OPTIC Management Toolkit (OMT). It also includes tasks to set up your environment. 

Before you begin, ensure that you have the deployment architecture planned and have the servers allocated as the control plane and worker nodes.

The following table provides a list of tasks that you must complete in the given order. A user can have multiple roles.

Install OPTIC Management Toolkit (OMT)

To deploy your application on-premises and use the embedded Kubernetes provided by OMT, you must install OMT and create the Kubernetes cluster.  

Task Where to perform Role How to perform
Install OPTIC Management Toolkit (OMT). First control plane node Suite administrator Install OMT (embedded K8s)

The link in the table takes you to the OMT documentation, which contains information that may not apply to SMA. When following the steps in this OMT doc, pay attention to the following items: 

  • When planning your deployment, also refer to the System requirements and Plan the deployment sections in the SMA documentation. 
  • When preparing databases, be aware that Oracle and ipv6 are currently not supported by SMA.
  • When completing the post-installation tasks, skip the task to configure load balancers. 

After completing the OMT installation and the post-installation tasks, return to this page to install the suite.

Prepare

Complete these preparation tasks before installing the suite.

Sr No. Task Where to perform Role How to perform
1 Prepare external databases for the suite in a production environment. Database server Database administrator Prepare external databases

2

Required only for the CMP FinOps capability.

Prepare Vertica datastore component to store CMP FinOps data.

 Database server Database administrator (Optional) Install and configure Vertica database
3 Download the suite chart package First control plane node Suite administrator Download ESM Chart package
4

If you wish to use a static persistent volume, create NFS volumes for the suite.

 NFS server Storage administrator Configure NFS volumes
5 Download the suite images and transfer them to a registry. First control plane node Suite administrator Upload images to a registry

Install the suite

Complete these tasks to install the suite.

Sr No. Task Where to perform Role How to perform
1

Configure a load balancer (reverse proxy server) for applications. You will use the load balancer's FQDN (for example, itsma.apps.yourcompany.com) later when configuring the external access host name in the values.yaml file.

You can use the same load balancer that you have configured for the control plane (see Configure a load balancer for the control plane) or a separate load balancer. 

 Reverse proxy server Network administrator Configure a load balancer (reverse proxy server) for applications
2 Create a new deployment for the suite.
Required only if you're going to Install the suite using CLI. Skip it if you will use AppHub. 		 First control plane node Suite administrator Create a new deployment for ESM
3

Prepare persistent volumes for ESM.

 First control plane node Suite administrator Prepare persistent volumes for ESM
4 Perform pre-installation checks First control plane node Suite administrator Perform pre-installation checks
5

Install the suite using CLI.

To install using CLI, you'll have to first Create my-values.yaml.

 First control plane node Suite administrator

Install ESM using CLI
Install the suite using AppHub AppHub Installation portal Suite administrator Install ESM using AppHub
6 Verify the installation. First control plane node Suite administrator Verify ESM installation
7

Perform database-related and tuning tasks after installation.

 Control plane nodes and database server Database administrator and suite administrator Post-installation tasks

Install UD/UCMDB

Task Where to perform Role How to perform

Required only if you want to install the SAM capability or the Native SACM solution.

Continue to install containerized UD/UCMDB on the same OMT cluster as the next deployment, or install classic UD/UCMDB. 

 Control plane node or the Windows or Linux server for UD/UCMDB Suite administrator (Optional) Install containerized UD/UCMDB or (Optional) Install classic UD/UCMDB.

Install OO Containerized

Task Where to perform Role How to perform

Required only if you want to enable the DND capability or use OO Containerized for integration.

Install Operations Orchestration(OO) Containerized on the same OMT cluster as a secondary deployment.

 Control plane node Suite administrator Install OO Containerized on-premises

Install Audit

Task Where to perform Role How to perform

Optional.

Install the audit service and audit collector for auditing purposes. 

 Control plane node Suite administrator

Install the Audit service

Install the Audit collector

Set up tenants

After installing the suite, perform the following initial setup tasks to use the suite.

Sr No. Task Where to perform Role How to perform
1

Tasks for suite administrators to perform in Suite Administration.

 Suite Administration Suite administrator Tenant setup tasks for suite administrators
2

Tasks for tenant administrators to perform in Service Management.

 Service Management Tenant administrators Tenant setup tasks for tenant administrators

Install add-on capabilities

Skip this section if you don't want to install add-on capabilities or if you've already installed them during the suite installation.

Install add-on capabilities on top of an existing suite if you didn't select them from the installation portal when deploying the suite. 

Task Where to perform Role How to perform

Install the CMP FinOps, Hybrid Cloud Management, Service Portal for Service Manager and Software Asset Management (SAM) capabilities on top of an existing suite.

 OMT AppHub or CLI Suite administrator Install add-on capabilities

Configure add-on capabilities

Skip this section if you don't want to install add-on capabilities.

Configure and enable add-on capabilities if you've installed them during or after the suite installation.

Sr No. Task Where to perform Role How to perform
1

Enable the SAM capability.

  Suite Administration Suite administrator and tenant administrator Enable SAM
2

Required only if you need to enable DND.

Enable Operations Orchestration Containerized

  Suite Administration Suite administrator and tenant administrator

Enable OO Containerized in Suite Administration
3

Enable the Hybrid Cloud Management capability.

 Suite Administration and Service Management Suite administrator and tenant administrator Enable DND
4

Enable the CMP FinOps capability.

  Suite Administration and Service Management Suite administrator and tenant administrator Enable CMP FinOps

Enable Native SACM

Skip this section if you don't want to use the Native SACM solution.

Configure and enable Native SACM after the suite deployment.

Task Where to perform Role How to perform

Enable Native SACM by using the UCMDB Gateway.

  Suite Administration Suite administrator Enable Native SACM
